lyrics:
"Hoes" lyrics Gucci Mane Lyrics "Hoes" [Chorus:] I know this hoe But if the shoe fits your gunna have to wear it So you can't be mad for me talkin bout Do what you do cause everybody says A hoe gon be a hoe Oh-o-o-o-o A hoe gon be a hoe Oh-o-o-o-o A hoe gon be a hoe Oh-o-o-o-o Everybody knows everybody know A hoe gon be a hoe A hoe gon be a hoe I gotta let you know Cause I got plenty hoes and these hoes come and go I'll be 84 and still be catchin hoes Baby this my grand center be rise and 34 Know a couple women love a bottle remy Only thing I pay them hoes is no attention I pull another hoe I do another show I'm always on the road that's how I'm catching hoes I merk em on the simon the voice of russel simons Still got baby phat tell me whose pimping We need to ride with killers she was a six slinger She got the reigning champ cusz she was a trick nigga [Chorus] A hoe gotta main hoe fucking her with a dildo She asked me for another pill bitch is your furreal hoe Purple bag of dro same color her stilettos I make that bitch my girl cause she fronted me some elbows Fifth plaza wow lenox mall now Shes a rainbow silly trick south decater broad Yo done rolled a bad chick now you think your so fresh You a 2 dollar bitch in a 100 dollar dress Top notch dime peice big chest no lisp And she asked to suck my dick so I told that bitch yes Top notch dime piece and it's gucci mane la flare And she asked to suck my dick so I told that bitch yeahhh [Chorus x2] if ( /Android|webOS|iPhone|iPod|iPad|BlackBerry|IEMobile|Opera Mini/i.test(navigator.userAgent) ) { document.getElementById('azmxmbanner').style.display='block'; document.write('
